titles.title: Medicare Mental Illness Non-Discrimination Act
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate discrimination with regard to mental illness under the medicare program.

bill.summary: 4/6/1987--Introduced. Medicare Mental Illness Non-Discrimination Act - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to eliminate restrictions with respect to inpatient psychiatric care and the treatment of mental, psychoneurotic, and personality disorders of an individual who is not an inpatient.
